resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105592</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105592</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101466</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Saving Venice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einsparung Venedig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Économie Venise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saving Veneza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Saving Venezia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποταμίευση Βενετία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ahorro Venecia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The historic city of Venice, Italy is sinking. City leaders have called upon Scripps and a multifaceted team of experts to help decipher the mysteries lying beneath its waters and save the city.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die historische Stadt von Venedig, Italien sinkt. 
Stadtführer haben Scripps und um ein vielfältiges Team der 
Experten ersucht, um zu helfen, die Geheimnisse zu dechiffrieren, die 
unter seinem Wasser und die Stadt zu sichern liegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La ville historique de Venise, Italie descend. 
Les amorces de ville ont invité Scripps et une équipe à 
plusieurs facettes d'experts pour aider à déchiffrer les mystères 
se trouvant sous ses eaux et à sauvegarder la ville.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A cidade historic de Veneza, Italy está 
afundando-se. Os líderes da cidade convidaram Scripps e uma 
equipe multifaceted dos peritos para ajudar decifrar os mistérios que
encontram-se abaixo de suas águas e conservar a cidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La città storica di Venezia, Italia sta 
affondandosi. I capi della città hanno invitato Scripps 
e una squadra multifaceted di esperti per contribuire a decifrare i 
misteri che si trovano sotto le relative acque ed a salvare la città.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορική πόλη της Βενετίας, Ιταλία βυθίζει. 
Οι ηγέτες πόλεων έχουν ζητήσει από Scripps και μια 
πολύπλευρη ομάδα των εμπειρογνωμόνων για να βοηθήσουν να 
αποκρυπτογραφήσουν τα μυστήρια που βρίσκονται κάτω από τα ύδατά
του και να σώσουν την πόλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La ciudad histórica de Venecia, Italia se está 
hundiendo. Los arranques de cinta de la ciudad han invitado a 
Scripps y a equipo multifaceted de expertos para ayudar a descifrar 
los misterios que mentían debajo de sus aguas y a salvar la ciudad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
FN:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101466</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105592</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/saving-venice</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
